title: Crystal structure modification of nano-hydroxyapatite using organic modifiers and hydrothermal technique
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29665-29674

Md. Kawsar, Md. Sahadat Hossain, Sumaya Tabassum, Dipa Islam, Newaz Mohammed Bahadur, Samina Ahmed
Hydrothermal technique and organic modifiers are effective tools for the modification of the crystal structure of nano-crystallite hydroxyapatite for fruitful applications.
